author: parithosh
content:
We have a tiny, short lived sepolia-shadowfork (https://4844-sepolia-sf1.ethpandaops.io/) (mainly to help us test our tooling). In case someone has violent ways to break it, let us know ðŸ˜„
Its based off of devnet-7 specs, so no new features were tested. Please continue to use devnet-7 for stable testing.
